mapper.select: select boardnum , id , title , content , to_char(inputdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') inputdate , hits from board where boardnum = #{boardnum}
mapper.update: update board set hits = hits + 1 where boardnum = #{boardnum}
mapper.select:
select boardnum , id , title , to_char(inputdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') inputdate , hits from board
where title like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
order by boardnum desc
